Apple Scab.description: Apple Scab is caused by the fungus *Venturia inaequalis*. It appears as olive-green spots on leaves and fruits, leading to premature fruit drop.
remedies: Improve air circulation around the tree
Apply fungicides like captan or myclobutanil during early spring

Cherry Powdery Mildew.description: This disease, caused by *Podosphaera clandestina*, creates a white powdery layer on leaves and shoots, affecting growth and fruit quality.

Corn Common Rust.description: Caused by the fungus *Puccinia sorghi*, this disease results in rust-colored pustules on leaves and can reduce yield.
remedies: Apply foliar fungicides if conditions are favorable for rust

Grape Leaf Blight.description: Leaf blight in grapes is commonly caused by *Pseudocercospora vitis*. Symptoms include browning leaf margins and defoliation.

Peach Bacterial Spot.description: This disease is caused by *Xanthomonas campestris*. It creates dark lesions on fruit and leaves, affecting market quality.

Tomato Leaf Mold.description: Leaf Mold is caused by *Passalora fulva* and thrives in humid conditions. Yellow patches and moldy growth appear on the underside of leaves.
remedies: Apply fungicides like chlorothalonil or copper-based sprays
